scripts.clean: turbo run clean && npm run clean:cache
scripts.clean:cache: rm -rf .turbo && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'node_modules/.cache' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:cache && rm -rf node_modules && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && npm install
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:network && COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker-compose build
scripts.docker:dev: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
